20101206182319.000|20101206182321.000|CCO|THERE WERE NO OTHER DEFENDERS.
20101206182321.000|20101206182322.667|CCO|THAT IS WHAT IS SO IMPORTANT

20101206182324.333|20101206182326.000|CCO|SINGLE GOVERNMENTAL DEFENDER

20101206183251.000|20101206183253.500|CCO|WHAT WEIN LOCKLIER ACT TO MAKE IT

20101206183256.000|20101206183258.500|CCO|>> WHAT WOULD HAPPEN IS NO ONE
